ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ndxarg.1 | |- E = Slot N |
| 2 |  | ndxarg.2 | |- N e. NN |
| 3 |  | #P_df-slot | |- Slot ( E ` ndx ) = ( x e. _V |-> ( x ` ( E ` ndx ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-slot | |- Slot N = ( x e. _V |-> ( x ` N ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_ndxarg | |- ( E ` ndx ) = N |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( x ` ( E ` ndx ) ) = ( x ` N ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_mpteq2i | |- ( x e. _V |-> ( x ` ( E ` ndx ) ) ) = ( x e. _V |-> ( x ` N ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqtr4i | |- Slot N = ( x e. _V |-> ( x ` ( E ` ndx ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_eqtr4i | |- Slot ( E ` ndx ) = Slot N |
| 10 | 1, 9 | #P_eqtr4i | |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) |
